amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in Part B of House Report 115-212 as en bloc No. 4: Nos. 69, 70, 71, 72, 73, 74, 75, 76, 77, 78, 79, 80, 81, 82, 83, 84, 85, 86, and 87.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendments (A017) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Thornberry amendment (A017) modified by unanimous consent. modification to amendment No. 76
Amendments en bloc (A017) offered by Mr. Thornberry.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendments en bloc (A017) offered by Mr. Thornberry.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendments (A017) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
